backend/main.mo: Primary backend canister handling authorization, user profiles, and full product CRUD with adminâ€‘restricted mutations and public product queries.
backend/migration.mo: Migration module that transforms old actor state, updating images for one specific product while preserving all other data.
feature_evidence.json: Feature evidence record describing required storefront behavior for product image sourcing and listing related frontend files.
frontend-file-summaries.txt: Aggregated summaries of numerous frontend files describing app structure, hooks, components, and behavior.
frontend/index.css: Tailwind CSS base definitions with custom light/dark theme CSS variables for UI styling.
frontend/index.html: Base HTML entrypoint loading the React app with metadata, manifest, and icons.
frontend/public/manifest.webmanifest: PWA manifest defining app name, icons, colors, and launch behavior.
frontend/src/App.tsx: React router configuration defining storefront and admin routes wrapped with theme provider and toaster.
frontend/src/components/admin/AdminLayou: Admin layout containing header navigation, login/profile setup, main outlet, and footer.
frontend/src/components/admin/AdminRoute: Route guard that enforces admin authentication with loading, login-required, and access-denied states.
frontend/src/components/auth/LoginButton: Login/logout button using Internet Identity, handling auth flow and error recovery.
frontend/src/components/auth/ProfileSetu: Modal prompting authenticated users with no profile to enter and save their name.
frontend/src/components/checkout/Checkou: Checkout form collecting customer info, validating input, creating orders, and handling payments.
frontend/src/components/storefront/Produ: Displays a product with image, name, description, price, and availability badge linking to details.
Product image gallery with main image, thumbnails, fallback handling, and selection state.
frontend/src/components/storefront/Quant: Stepper component to increment or decrement quantity within min/max limits.
frontend/src/components/storefront/Store: Main storefront layout with header, navigation, mobile menu, and cart badge.
frontend/src/hooks/useActor.ts: Creates and caches a backend actor based on identity, refreshing dependent queries on change.
frontend/src/hooks/useAdmin.ts: Admin-focused hooks for checking admin status and managing products and orders via actor.
frontend/src/hooks/useInternetIdentity.t: Provides a React context and provider for Internet Identity authentication, handling login, logout, and identity loading. Wraps AuthClient setup and exposes login state flags.
frontend/src/hooks/useQueries.ts: Defines React Query hooks for fetching products, orders, and user profiles, and for creating orders and saving profiles. Integrates backend actor calls with caching and image normalization.
frontend/src/index.css: Tailwind CSS setup defining light/dark theme variables and base styles. Includes custom color tokens and utility classes.
frontend/src/lib/deliveryFee.ts: Calculates delivery fees, offering free delivery when the cart contains only a specific product. Defaults to a standard fee otherwise.
frontend/src/lib/orderStatus.ts: Maps order status values to human-readable labels and badge variants for UI display.
frontend/src/lib/payment.ts: Defines payment method labels, helper checks for manual payments, and constants for payment instructions.
frontend/src/lib/whatsapp.ts: Builds formatted WhatsApp order messages and generates shareable WhatsApp links. Includes logic for displaying transaction IDs for manual payments.
frontend/src/main.tsx: Bootstraps the React app with QueryClientProvider and InternetIdentityProvider before rendering the root component.
frontend/src/pages/admin/AdminOrderDetai: Admin view for a single order with actions to verify payment, confirm, deliver, or cancel.
frontend/src/pages/admin/AdminOrdersPage: Admin table listing all orders with status, payment info, and navigation to order details.
frontend/src/pages/admin/AdminProductEdi: Form for creating or editing a product with fields for name, description, price, images, and active status.
frontend/src/pages/admin/AdminProductsPa: Renders admin product list with add, edit, and deactivate actions, including loading and empty states.
frontend/src/pages/CartPage.tsx: Displays the shopping cart, allowing quantity updates, item removal, and showing an order summary. Navigates to catalog when empty.
frontend/src/pages/CatalogPage.tsx: Fetches and displays active products with loading and error states. Shows a product grid using ProductCard components.
frontend/src/pages/CheckoutPage.tsx: Renders the checkout form if the cart has items, otherwise prompts users to return to catalog. Includes navigation back to the cart.
frontend/src/pages/HomePage.tsx: Landing page showing a hero section, features, and a button navigating to the catalog.
frontend/src/pages/OrderConfirmationPage: Displays order confirmation details, customer info, items, and payment/WhatsApp actions.
frontend/src/pages/ProductDetailsPage.ts: Shows detailed product info, gallery, pricing, quantity selection, and add-to-cart functionality.
frontend/src/state/cart.ts: Defines a persisted Zustand store for cart items with add, remove, quantity update, total, and count helpers.
frontend/src/utils/productImages.ts: Provides helpers to normalize product image URLs and overrides images for specific products with known issues.
frontend/src/utils/urlParams.ts: Utility for reading, storing, and clearing URL and session parameters, including hash-based routing support.
frontend/tailwind.config.js: Tailwind configuration extending colors, animations, and container settings with plugins for typography, queries, and animations.
project_state.json: Project metadata describing app goals, architecture notes, known issues, and implemented features.
